meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Lauren Michniacki Jody Jabbora Jill Rausch Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7462.

td.p: Lauren Michniacki, a consumer insights manager from Chicago, Illinois
Jody Jabbora, a retired postal clerk from Las Vegas, Nevada
Jill Rausch, a captioner from Phoenix, Arizona (whose 1-day cash winnings total $12,801)

tr.td: PUZZLERS
NORTH AMERICAN HISTORY
ON THE MOVIE'S SOUNDTRACK
CITIES
CAPTAINS
OF INDUSTRY

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
